snippet: Though she notched some of the biggest wins of the early part of her career in the United States, Petra Kvitova has a career record in North America that hardly reflects a top-five player.
abstract: Though she notched some of the biggest wins of the early part of her career in the United States, Petra Kvitova has a career record in North America that hardly reflects a top-five player.

headline.main: Kvitova Struggles for Wins in North America
